TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Blend extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義 物件的漸變圖樣。

span.span: Defines a blend pattern for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 漸層常用順暢地將內部的圖形。Gradients are commonly used to smoothly shade the interiors of shapes. 混合模式由兩個陣列所定義 (和) 每個包含相同數目的項目。A blend pattern is defined by two arrays ( and ) that each contain the same number of elements. 每個項目陣列都代表沿著漸層線的距離的比例。Each element of the array represents a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 每個項目陣列都代表的開始和結束的色彩漸層線中的對應項目所表示的位置的漸層的混合比例陣列。Each element of the array represents the proportion of the starting and ending colors in the gradient blend at the position along the gradient line represented by the corresponding element in the array. 例如，如果對應的項目和陣列是 0.2 和 0.3，分別為 100 像素線條，沿著 （20%的距離) 該線條的色彩 20 像素的紅色藍色從線形漸層包含 30%藍色和紅色的 70%。For example, if corresponding elements of the and arrays are 0.2 and 0.3, respectively, for a linear gradient from blue to red along a 100-pixel line, the color 20 pixels along that line (20 percent of the distance) consists of 30 percent blue and 70 percent red. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 Windows Form 環境中。The following example is intended to be used in a Windows Forms environment. 它會示範如何使用類別搭配類別繪製橢圓形螢幕上，會有其混合的色彩。It demonstrates how to use the class in conjunction with the class to draw an ellipse to screen that has its colors blended. 橢圓形是漸變為中心，紅色左側的藍色和漸變回右邊的藍色。The ellipse is blue on the left, blends to red in the center, and blends back to blue on the right. 這透過在設定來完成`myFactors`和`myPositions`使用的陣列和屬性。This is accomplished through the settings in the `myFactors` and `myPositions` arrays used in the and properties. 請注意，屬性名為物件`lgBrush2`必須設定成等於物件`myBlend`。Note that the property of the object named `lgBrush2` must be made equal to the object `myBlend`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用 Windows Form 環境中。The following example is intended to be used in a Windows Forms environment. 它會示範如何使用類別搭配類別繪製橢圓形螢幕上，會有其混合的色彩。It demonstrates how to use the class in conjunction with the class to draw an ellipse to screen that has its colors blended. 橢圓形是漸變為中心，紅色左側的藍色和漸變回右邊的藍色。The ellipse is blue on the left, blends to red in the center, and blends back to blue on the right. 這透過在設定來完成`myFactors`和`myPositions`使用的陣列和屬性。This is accomplished through the settings in the `myFactors` and `myPositions` arrays used in the and properties. 請注意，屬性名為物件`lgBrush2`必須設定成等於物件`myBlend`。Note that the property of the object named `lgBrush2` must be made equal to the object `myBlend`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定漸層的漸變因數陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of blend factors for the gradient.

value.span: 漸變因數的陣列，指定要在對應位置使用的開始色彩和結束色彩的百分比。

span.span: An array of blend factors that specify the percentages of the starting color and the ending color to be used at the corresponding position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，這個陣列的項目是從 0.0 到 1.0 f 的值。Typically, the elements of this array are a value from 0.0f through 1.0f. 這些項目指定的結束色彩和使用在對應的開始色彩的百分比 blend 位置。These elements specify the percentages of the ending color and the starting color to use at the corresponding blend position. 例如，值為 0.2 表示中指定的位置，包含混合的色彩是個結束的漸層色彩的 20%和 80%的漸層開始色彩。For example, a value of 0.2 indicates that at the specified position, the blended color is composed of 20 percent of the ending gradient color and 80 percent of the starting gradient color. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別藉由設定和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class by setting the and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼入匯入表單命名空間。Paste the code into a form that imports the namespace. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DemonstrateBlend`方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form's event and call the `DemonstrateBlend` method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ Positions { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };
member this.Positions : single[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定漸層的漸變位置陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of blend positions for the gradient.

value.span: 漸變位置的陣列，指定沿著漸層線的距離百分比。

span.span: An array of blend positions that specify the percentages of distance along the gradient line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個陣列的項目指定百分比沿著漸層線的距離。The elements of this array specify percentages of distance along the gradient line. 例如，項目值的 0.2 指定此點是起始點的總距離的 20%。For example, an element value of 0.2f specifies that this point is 20 percent of the total distance from the starting point. 這個陣列中的項目會以 0.0 和 1.0 f 之間的浮點值。The elements in this array are represented by float values between 0.0f and 1.0f. 陣列的第一個項目必須是 0.0 f，和最後一個項目必須是 1.0 f。The first element of the array must be 0.0f, and the last element must be 1.0f. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別藉由設定和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class by setting the and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼入匯入表單命名空間。Paste the code into a form that imports the namespace. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DemonstrateBlend`方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form's event and call the `DemonstrateBlend` method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/VB/form1.vb#5)]
